#define MOD 1000000007
long long a[10000000]={1,2,4,8,16,32,64,128,256,512,1024};
int main()
{
	int t,last=10;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		int n;
		long long sum=0;
		scanf("%d",&n);
		if(a[n]==0)
		{
			while(last<=n)
			{
				a[last+1]=(a[last]*2)%MOD;
				last++;
			}
		}
		printf("%lld\n",a[n]%MOD);
		
	}
	return 0;
}
